longDef.en: used to show an exact position or particular place
longDef.cn: （表示地点或位置）在…里;在…上;在…旁

examples.en: We'll meet you at the entrance.
examples.cn: 我们会在入口处跟你碰头。

examples.en: That bit at the beginning of the film was brilliant.
examples.cn: 电影开头的那一段精彩极了。

examples.en: She's sitting at the table in the corner.
examples.cn: 她坐在角落的一张桌子旁。

examples.en: She was standing at the top of the stairs.
examples.cn: 她在楼梯顶端站着。

examples.en: The dog came and lay down at (= next to) my feet.
examples.cn: 这只狗过来趴在我的脚边。

examples.en: There's someone at the door (= someone is outside and wants to come in).
examples.cn: 有人敲门。

examples.en: We spent the afternoon at a football match.
examples.cn: 我们下午去看了场足球比赛。

examples.en: I enjoyed my three years at university.
examples.cn: 我在大学度过了3年美好的时光。

examples.en: I called her but she was at lunch (= away, eating her lunch).
examples.cn: 我打电话给她，但是她出去吃午饭了。

longDef.en: used to show an exact or a particular time
longDef.cn: （表示确切或某一时间）在…时刻;在…期间;在…岁时

examples.en: There's a meeting at 2.30 this afternoon.
examples.cn: 今天下午两点半有个会。

examples.en: Are you free at lunchtime?
examples.cn: 吃午饭的时候你有空吗？

examples.en: In theory, women can still have children at the age of 50.
examples.cn: 理论上说，妇女到了50岁仍可以生育。

examples.en: The bells ring at regular intervals through the day.
examples.cn: 在一天中，这些钟每隔一段时间就会准时鸣响。

examples.en: At no time/point did the company do anything illegal.
examples.cn: 这家公司从未做过任何违法的事情。

examples.en: I'm busy at the moment (= now) - can you call back later?
examples.cn: 我现在很忙，你过一会儿再打回来行吗？

examples.en: It's a shame I wasn't here to meet you - I was overseas at the time (= then).
examples.cn: 真可惜那次我不在，没有见到你——那时我在国外呢。

examples.en: She smiled at me.
examples.cn: 她对我微笑了一下。

examples.en: They waved at us as we drove by.
examples.cn: 我们驱车经过时，他们朝我们挥手。

examples.en: She aimed at the target.
examples.cn: 她瞄准目标。

examples.en: "Look at me! Look at me!" called the little girl.
examples.cn: “看看我！看看我！”那个小女孩叫道。

examples.en: He's always shouting at the children.
examples.cn: 他老是冲着孩子们大喊大叫。

longDef.en: used to show the cause of something, especially a feeling
longDef.cn: （尤指感觉是）由于，因为，作为对…的反应

examples.en: We were surprised at the news.
examples.cn: 我们听到这个消息很吃惊。

examples.en: I was quite excited at the prospect.
examples.cn: 想到这种前景，我激动不已。

examples.en: Why does no one ever laugh at my jokes?
examples.cn: 为什么我讲了笑话，从来就没人笑呢？

longDef.en: used to show the activity in which someone's ability is being judged

examples.en: I was never very good at sports.
examples.cn: 我从来都不太擅长体育运动。

examples.en: He's very good at getting on with people.
examples.cn: 他很善于跟人打交道。

examples.en: She's hopeless at organizing things.
examples.cn: 她办什么事情都没有条理，简直不可救药。

longDef.en: the @ symbol that joins the name of a person or a department in an organization to a domain name to make an email address

examples.en: "What's your email address?" "It's dictionary at cambridge dot org."
examples.cn: “你的电邮地址是什么？”“是 dictionary@cambridge.org。”

longDef.en: used to show a price, temperature, rate, speed, etc.
longDef.cn: （表示价格、温度、比率、速度等）以，达

examples.en: I'm not going to buy those shoes at $150!
examples.cn: 那么一双鞋要150美元，我才不会买！

examples.en: Inflation is running at 5 percent.
examples.cn: 通货膨胀率达到5%。

examples.en: He was driving at 120 mph when the police spotted him.
examples.cn: 当警察发现他时，他正以120英里的时速行驶。

longDef.en: used in financial records to show the price, rate, etc. of a particular thing or of each of a number of things on a list
longDef.cn: （用于财务记录中表示某一项目的价格、比率等的）符号@

examples.cn: 50件，每件4.75英镑

longDef.en: used to show a state, condition, or continuous activity
longDef.cn: （表示状态、状况或连续的活动）处于;从事于;忙于

examples.en: a country at war
examples.cn: 处于战争状态的国家

examples.en: children at play
examples.cn: 玩耍的孩子们
